#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int numberOfNails;
        cin>>numberOfNails;

        int s2,s3,s4;
        cin>>s2>>s3>>s4;
        int midNumber = s2*100 + s3*10 + s4;
        int totalCost=0;

        for(int i=99999; i>=0; i--)
        {
            if(i%numberOfNails==0)
            {
                int num1 = (i/10000)*1000;
                int num2 = i/10;
                if((num2-num1) == midNumber)
                {
                    totalCost=i;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }

        int dig1=totalCost/10000;
        int dig2=totalCost%10;

        if(dig1!=0 && (totalCost/numberOfNails)!=0)
        cout<<dig1<<" "<<dig2<<" "<<(totalCost/numberOfNails)<<endl;
        else
        cout<<0<<endl;
    }
}
